code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from"react";var OurProject=function OurProject(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container our-project",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-heading",children:"Our Mission"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"What is the Mission of Samashti?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"To Facilitate funding for easy transition to Organic Farming"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:" To facilitate fund raising required to make the village self-sufficient with all the infrastructure required to conduct organic farming."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:" We plan to enable an ecosystem of farm inputs for smooth transition of farmers through collaboration with various suppliers and service providers."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:" To raise funds for training the farmers for easy transition."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:" To make the farmers feel proud of their profession and enable them to become contributors for creating future organic farmers for our beautiful India."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:" To enable them to upgrade their earnings and livelihood to live comfortably and to create more employment opportunities for other residents of the village."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:" Empower women in the household to become entrepreneurs in rearing livestock and other allied agricultural activities to support their livelihood.
